title: A 342-nm ultraviolet AlGaN multiple-quantum-well laser diode
title_cn: 342 nm紫外AlGaN多量子阱激光二极管
abstract: The realization of semiconductor laser diodes and light-emitting diodes that emit short-wavelength ultraviolet light is of considerable interest for a number of applications including chemical/biochemical analysis, high-density data storage and material processing. Group III nitride materials are one of the most promising candidates for fabricating such devices. Here we describe an AlGaN multiple-quantum-well laser diode that emits light at 342 nm, the shortest wavelength ever reported for an electrically driven laser diode. To fabricate the laser, a low-dislocation-density AlGaN layer with an AlN mole fraction of 0.3 was grown on a sapphire substrate using a hetero facet-controlled epitaxial lateral overgrowth (hetero-FACELO) method. An AlGaN multiple-quantum-well structure was then grown on the high-quality AlGaN layer. Lasing at a wavelength of 342.3 nm was observed under pulsed current mode at room temperature.
abstract_cn: 发出短波长紫外光的半导体激光二极管和发光二极管的实现对于包括化学/生化分析，高密度数据存储和材料处理在内的许多应用具有相当大的兴趣。 III族氮化物材料是制造这种器件的最有希望的候选者之一。 在这里，我们描述了一种AlGaN多量子阱激光二极管，该二极管发射的光波长为342nm，这是电驱动激光二极管所报告的最短波长。 为了制造激光器，使用异质面控制的外延横向过生长（异质-FACELO）方法在蓝宝石衬底上生长AlN摩尔分数为0.3的低位错密度AlGaN层。 然后在高质量的AlGaN层上生长AlGaN多量子阱结构。 在室温下在脉冲电流模式下观察到波长为342.3nm的激光。

title: A compact free-electron laser for generating coherent radiation in the extreme ultraviolet region
title_cn: 紧凑的自由电子激光器，用于在极紫外区域产生相干辐射
abstract: Single-pass free-electron lasers based on self-amplified spontaneous emission are enabling the generation of laser light at ever shorter wavelengths, including extreme ultraviolet, soft X-rays and even hard X-rays. A typical X-ray free-electron laser is a few kilometres in length and requires an electron-beam energy higher than 10 GeV (refs ). If such light sources are to become accessible to more researchers, a significant reduction in scale is desirable Here, we report observations of brilliant extreme-ultraviolet radiation from a 55-m-long compact self-amplified spontaneous-emission source, which combines short-period undulators with a high-quality electron source operating at a low acceleration energy of 250 MeV. The radiation power reaches saturation at wavelengths ranging from 51 to 61 nm with a maximum pulse energy of 30 µJ. The ultralow emittance (0.6π mm mrad) of the electron beam from a CeB6 thermionic cathode is barely degraded by a multiple-stage bunch compression system that dramatically enhances the beam current from 1 to 300 A. This achievement expands the potential for generating X-ray free-electron laser radiation with a compact 2-GeV machine.
abstract_cn: 基于自放大自发发射的单通自由电子激光器能够产生更短波长的激光，包括极紫外，软X射线甚至硬X射线。典型的X射线自由电子激光器的长度为几公里，并且需要的电子束能量要高于10 GeV（refs）。如果要让更多的研究人员可以使用这种光源，则需要将其尺寸显着减小。在此，我们报告观察到来自55米长的紧凑型自放大自发辐射源（结合了短时自具有高质量电子源的周期波动器，在250MeV的低加速能量下运行。辐射功率在51到61 nm的波长范围内达到饱和，最大脉冲能量为30J。多级束压缩系统几乎不会降解来自CeB 6 热电子阴极的电子束的超低发射率（0.6＆＃160;＆＃160; mm＆＃160; mrad）束电流从1到300＆＃160A。这一成就扩大了使用紧凑型2-GeV机器产生X射线自由电子激光辐射的潜力。

title: Massively parallel X-ray holography
title_cn: 大规模平行X射线全息术
abstract: Advances in the development of free-electron lasers offer the realistic prospect of nanoscale imaging on the timescale of atomic motions. We identify X-ray Fourier-transform holography as a promising but, so far, inefficient scheme to do this. We show that a uniformly redundant array placed next to the sample, multiplies the efficiency of X-ray Fourier transform holography by more than three orders of magnitude, approaching that of a perfect lens, and provides holographic images with both amplitude- and phase-contrast information. The experiments reported here demonstrate this concept by imaging a nano-fabricated object at a synchrotron source, and a bacterial cell with a soft-X-ray free-electron laser, where illumination by a single 15-fs pulse was successfully used in producing the holographic image. As X-ray lasers move to shorter wavelengths we expect to obtain higher spatial resolution ultrafast movies of transient states of matter.
abstract_cn: 自由电子激光技术的发展为原子运动的时间尺度上的纳米级成像提供了现实的前景。 我们将X射线傅里叶变换全息术确定为有前途但到目前为止效率不高的方案。 我们展示了一个均匀冗余的阵列放置在样品旁边，将X射线傅里叶变换全息术的效率乘以三个以上的数量级，接近完美透镜的效率，并且提供了具有幅度和相位对比的全息图像 信息。 此处报道的实验通过在同步加速器源处对纳米加工的物体以及带有软X射线自由电子激光的细菌细胞进行成像，从而证明了这一概念，其中成功地将单个15 fs脉冲照明用于产生 全息图像。 随着X射线激光器移动到更短的波长，我们期望获得更高的空间分辨率的超快电影，以记录物质的瞬态。

title: Small-divergence semiconductor lasers by plasmonic collimation
title_cn: 等离子体准直的小散度半导体激光器
abstract: Surface plasmons offer the exciting possibility of improving the functionality of optical devices through the subwavelength manipulation of light. We show that surface plasmons can be used to shape the beams of edge-emitting semiconductor lasers and greatly reduce their large intrinsic beam divergence. Using quantum cascade lasers as a model system, we show that by defining a metallic subwavelength slit and a grating on their facet, a small beam divergence in the laser polarization direction can be achieved. Divergence angles as small as 2.4° are obtained, representing a reduction in beam spread by a factor of 25 compared with the original 9.9-µm-wavelength laser used. Despite having a patterned facet, our collimated lasers do not suffer significant reductions in output power (∼100 mW at room temperature). Plasmonic collimation provides a means of efficiently coupling the output of a variety of lasers into optical fibres and waveguides, or to collimate them for applications such as free-space communications, ranging and metrology.
abstract_cn: 表面等离子体激元提供了通过光的亚波长操纵来改善光学设备功能的令人兴奋的可能性。我们表明，表面等离子体激元可用于整形边缘发射半导体激光器的光束，并大大减小其大的固有光束发散度。使用量子级联激光器作为模型系统，我们表明，通过在其小面上定义金属亚波长狭缝和光栅，可以实现在激光偏振方向上的小光束发散。发散角小至2.4＆＃176;所获得的光束表示与使用的原始9.9-m波长激光器相比光束扩展减少了25倍。尽管具有图案化的刻面，但我们的准直激光器的输出功率并未显着降低（在室温下为100mW）。等离子体准直提供了一种有效地将各种激光器的输出耦合到光纤和波导中的方法，或者为自由空间通信，测距和计量等应用准直它们的方法。

title: Stable generation of GeV-class electron beams from self-guided laser–plasma channels
title_cn: 自导激光-等离子体通道稳定产生GeV级电子束
abstract: Table-top laser-driven plasma accelerators are gaining attention for their potential use in miniaturizing future high-energy accelerators. By irradiating gas jet targets with ultrashort intense laser pulses, the generation of quasimonoenergetic electron beams was recently observed. Currently, the stability of beam generation and the ability to scale to higher electron beam energies are critical issues for practical laser acceleration. Here, we demonstrate the first generation of stable GeV-class electron beams from stable few-millimetre-long plasma channels in a self-guided wakefield acceleration process. As primary evidence of the laser wakefield acceleration in a bubble regime, we observed a boost of both the electron beam energy and quality by reducing the plasma density and increasing the plasma length in a 1-cm-long gas jet. Subsequent three-dimensional simulations show the possibility of achieving even higher electron beam energies by minimizing plasma bubble elongation, and we anticipate dramatic increases in beam energy and quality in the near future. This will pave the way towards ultracompact, all-optical electron beam accelerators and their applications in science, technology and medicine.
abstract_cn: 台式激光驱动的等离子体加速器因其在使未来的高能加速器小型化方面的潜在用途而受到关注。通过用超短的强激光脉冲照射气体靶，最近观察到准单能电子束的产生。当前，束产生的稳定性和按比例缩放到更高的电子束能量的能力是实际激光加速的关键问题。在这里，我们演示了在自导尾波场加速过程中从稳定的几毫米长等离子通道产生的第一代稳定的GeV类电子束。作为气泡状态下激光尾波加速的主要证据，我们观察到通过减小1 cm长的气体射流中的等离子体密度和增加等离子体长度，电子束能量和质量都有所提高。随后的三维模拟显示了通过最小化等离子气泡伸长来获得更高电子束能量的可能性，并且我们预计在不久的将来电子束能量和质量会急剧增加。这将为超紧凑的全光学电子束加速器及其在科学，技术和医学中的应用铺平道路。
